name: Haunted Dungeons 2
description:
You awake finding youself trapped in a dungeon, with no memory of how you got here. Yet you have a strange feeling of detatchment from your own body, then you realise... you can leave your body and roam around the world with only your soul!

Now you must use your new power and work together with your two forms to escape this nightmare.

The Team

Jeremy - Development

Chris - Development + Level Design
